title: Jakob Gimpel, pianist: program No. 17
creator_credit: Paul Gordon, George Moskov and Official Films
brief_description: A Frederic Chopin recital performed by Polish-American pianist, Jakob Gimpel, featuring “Etude in E Major” (Opus 10, No. 3), “Waltz in C Sharp Minor” (Opus 64, No. 2) and “Mazurka in B Flat Major” (Opus 7, No. 1). Arranged by Roy Douglas into the ballet “Le Sylphide”.
